properties.name: BR001
properties.site-address: Garage court rear of Marybrook Street car park, Marybrook Street Berkeley
properties.notes: BERKELEY|This site could be redeveloped for high density housing, comprising flats at an average density of about 60 dph, and the suggested yield is 5 units.

properties.notes: BRIMSCOMBE & THRUPP|This site (24 units)could be redeveloped for medium-high density housing comprising flats and townhouses at an average density of 50-75dph, and the suggested yield is up to 30 units.

properties.name: BR003
properties.site-address: Brimscombe Mills & Mill Pond, London Road Brimscombe
properties.notes: BRIMSCOMBE & THRUPP|This site could be developed for a mix of housing and employment uses including medium to high density housing comprising flats and townhouses at an average density of 50-75dph, and the suggested yield is around 25 units, subject to achieving a satisfactory mix with other uses.

properties.name: BR022
properties.site-address: Land North Of Dudbridge Hill, Dudbridge Stroud
properties.notes: Main constraints: Industrial Heritage Conservation Area, access. Site investigation required. Summary: The site is considered deliverable for housing within 5 years, in conjunction with adjoining land at Dudbridge Hill, and is available now.. Lapsed planning permission for the erection of 31 dwellings including demolition of existing buildings and structures. Part of current application site, including Land at Dudbridge Hill (see permissioned sites), for development of 84 dwellings.

properties.name: BR023

Part of current application site S.17/2729/FUL.
